content: nora collar by muto crochet designs yarn ​ alize diva hook ​2mm gauge ​ 8 row of 20 double_crochet = 4 * 4 measurements length 1 - 15 inches length 2 - 23 inches length 3 - 25 inches pattern code chain s = chain single_crochet = single_crochet sl = slip_stitch double_crochet = double_crochet st s = stitch es skp = skip chain space = chain space yoh = yarn over hook important notes ​ read this before you begin ● the pattern is written for length 1 with length 2​ ​ & 3​ ​in brackets ● if using the suggested yarn alize diva the collar will not reach the proper length until it has been steam blocked or ironed flat if you would like to avoid those steps you can either use a 2 5 mm hook or make a longer length ● if using any other yarn you can adjust the pattern to any length by adjusting the foundation chain chain an even number of chains and add 1 extra chain not forgetting to add the turning chains eg 10 + 1 + 3 turning chains ● chain 4 at the beginning of row counts as a double_crochet stitch and ch1 ● if you would prefer to sew on a button instead of´ having the straps leave out the chain 45 in row 6 row 1 chain 85 ​111​ ​135​ + 3 turning chains double_crochet into 6th chain from hook counts as double_crochet and ch1 ch1 skp the next chain double_crochet into the next chain ×41 ​54 ​ ​66​ turn row 2 ch4 counts as double_crochet and chain 1 double_crochet into the next double_crochet ch1 skp ch1 double_crochet into the next double_crochet ×40 5​ 3​ 65 ​ ch1 skp the next chain double_crochet into the next chain 2nd chain of ch5 row 3 ch4 double_crochet into the next double_crochet ch1 skp ch1 double_crochet into the next double_crochet × 40 ​53​ ​65 ​ ch1 skp the next chain double_crochet into the next chain 2nd chain of ch4 row 4 ch5 skp the next ch1 space skp the next double_crochet single_crochet into the next chain space ch2 skp the next chain space 《double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet》 into the next chain space ch2 skp the next chain space single_crochet into next chain space ch5 skp the next chain space single_crochet into the next chain space ×6 ​8 ​​10 ​ ch2 skp the next chain space 《double_crochet ch1 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch2 double_crochet ch1 double_crochet》 into the next chain space ch2 skp the next chain space single_crochet into the next chain space ch2 skp the next double_crochet skp the next ch1 double_crochet into the next chain turn row 5 ch1 single_crochet into the first double_crochet 《picot double_crochet into the next double_crochet ch1 picot double_crochet into next chain space》x4 ch1 picot double_crochet into the next double_crochet single_crochet into the 3rdch of the next ch5 space x7 ​9 ​ ​11 ​ continued in row 6 row 6 single_crochet along
